name: Earthdawn (FASA Official) character sheet companion
description:
The Roll20 Earthdawn (FASA Official) character sheet helper API is made to work with the Earthdawn (FASA Official) character sheet and also the 1879 (FASA Official) character sheet. It provides many features that automate and assist in many tasks. It is optimized for Earthdawn 4th edition and 1879 1st Edition, but currently has limited support for other editions.

 For more information please see [Earthdawn Sheet wiki page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Earthdawn_-_FASA_Official).
